price: 208. Ô vous qui avez cru ! Entrez tous en Islam, n’emboîtez pas le pas à Satan car il est, pour vous, un ennemi avéré.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱدۡخُلُواْ فِي ٱلسِّلۡمِ كَآفَّةٗ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُواْ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ud'khulū fī al-sil'mi kāffatan walā tattabiʿū khuṭuwāti al-shayṭāni innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubīnun
